definition: year in, year out (idiom)/(over) many years

sentences.english: She is an inveterate reader of silly love stories.
sentences.chinese: 她長年不變地讀愚蠢的愛情小說。

sentences.english: I worked with the patience of a redwood growing rings.
sentences.chinese: 我這種耐心，堪與紅杉樹長年輪媲美。

sentences.english: He himself is a perennial Nobel also-ran.
sentences.chinese: 他自己就長年是諾貝爾和平獎落選者。

sentences.english: The road builders brave the wind and snow on the plateaus all the year round.
sentences.chinese: 築路工人長年奮戰在風雪高原。

sentences.english: The ancient tower still stops up,exposed to the weather for ages.
sentences.chinese: 經過長年累月的風吹日曬，那座古塔依然豎立在那裏。

sentences.english: For years, he prone paint and his hands full of callosity.
sentences.chinese: 長年俯地作畫，令他雙手佈滿老繭。

sentences.english: The child has grown out of his clothes.
sentences.chinese: 這小孩長年夜呢，已穿不下介意服。

sentences.english: Through a long period of weathering.
sentences.chinese: 經過長年風化，斑斑點點的。

sentences.english: The teacher was leaned out by his long illness.
sentences.chinese: 長年生病使這位老師變得消瘦。

sentences.english: Ningbo Chenglong Special Steel Co. , Ltd has Long years of marketing and distribution of special steel.
sentences.chinese: 成龍特殊鋼有限公司長年經營特殊鋼的營銷和配送。

sentences.english: The old book is gradually disintegrating with age.
sentences.chinese: 這本舊書因長年翻閱正在逐漸破損。

sentences.english: Mr. Bellès, who is Catalan, lives in Cadaqués all year long.
sentences.chinese: 貝勒先生是加泰羅尼亞人，並長年居住在卡得奎。

sentences.english: Clouds of smoke and steam filled the air for ever and ever .
sentences.chinese: 空氣里長年累月充滿着繚繞不絕的濃煙和蒸氣。

sentences.english: Our company long-term undertaking all kinds of sheet metal processing and plastic processing business.
sentences.chinese: 本公司長年承接各種板金加工和噴塑加工業務。

sentences.english: For the long-time widow. No one can replace a loved one.
sentences.chinese: 對那些長年孤寡的人來說，沒有人能取代他們的愛人。

sentences.english: Some bots have been defusing bombs for years, but none have seen combat.
sentences.chinese: 一些長年用於拆彈的機器人卻一直未見用於實戰。

definition: long term/long time/long range (of a forecast)
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
to make a supreme effort/at all costs

to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing
for this reason/with regards to this/in this respect/in order to do this/to this end
